content.prompt: According to the article, how do Chinese college students differ from college students in Europe and the United States?

choices.label: Relatively few Chinese students major in a humanities field.
Chinese students tend to spend more time studying.
Chinese students tend to take fewer courses outside their major field of study.
Chinese students are generally better qualified for technical occupations when they graduate.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
